name: The Bunker (prototype)
description:
The Bunker is a short prototype adventure game that uses array lists to create a card-based battle system. You play as an employee of the Society of Intelligent Creatures for Kindness, otherwise known as the S.I.C.K.-- basically the U.N., hundreds of years in the future, and dedicated to interplanetary relationships. 

Here, you will face bandits and rivals while collecting seeds from a seed bunker left behind hundreds of years ago. While outside of battle, you must explore the bunker and collect the necessary supplies to win. While in battle, you must use your special set of skills, shown as cards, to defeat enemies.

UPDATE 1.0: Full game is done! Changed a few puzzles, updated with music and bug fixes!
